personal.name: Yash Mahadevwala
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.bio: I'm a passionate web developer with expertise in Vue.js and laravel. I love creating beautiful, responsive web applications that provide exceptional user experiences.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Leading the frontend development team, implementing Vue.js applications, and improving website performance.
highlights: Led migration from Vue 2 to Vue 3, improving performance by 30%
Implemented Tailwind CSS, reducing CSS bundle size by 40%
Automated testing with Jest, achieving 85% code coverage

experience.title: Backend PHP/Laravel Developer
experience.description: Developed responsive websites and web applications for various clients using Vue.js and JavaScript.
highlights: Built 15+ client websites using Vue.js and custom CMS integrations
Improved site performance scores to 90+ on Google PageSpeed
Mentored junior developers on JavaScript best practices

projects.title: E-commerce Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive dashboard for e-commerce businesses to track sales, inventory, and customer data.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A weather application that displays current weather and forecasts based on location.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: A Kanban-style task management application with drag-and-drop functionality.

education.description: Focused on web development and software engineering principles.
focuses on the study of business and trade, preparing students for careers in finance, management, and related fields, with core subjects including Accountancy, Economics, and Business Studies.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.testimonial: John is an exceptional developer who consistently delivers high-quality code. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills have been invaluable to our team.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.testimonial: Working with John was a pleasure. He quickly grasps complex requirements and turns them into elegant solutions. I would hire him again in a heartbeat.
